title: Got any lower grade southern leaguers
author: bbcard1

posts.post_title: Got any lower grade southern leaguers
posts.post_content:
Looking for low grade of the following t206 Southern Leaguers...LMK if you have any available...

Bastain
Bernhard
Breitenstein
Fritz
Helm
Hickman
Hooker
Greminger
Kiernan
Lafitte
Lipe
Manion
Mullaney
Persons
Reagan
Revelle
Sid Smith
Thornton

I am very forgiving so far as grade...just prefer

No trims or missing pieces
No writing on front
No creases across the face

Let me know and thanks...
